name: base64-encoding
description: Fast Base64 encoding powered by WebAssembly

scripts.copy: cp docs/README.md README.md && cp docs/LICENSE.md LICENSE.md
scripts.sed: npm run sed:_config && npm run sed:LICENSE
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:wasm: npm run build:wasm:cpp && npm run build:wasm:b64
scripts.build:dist: (npm run build:dist:mjs & npm run build:dist:cjs & wait) && npm run build:dist:dist
scripts.build:dist:cjs: tsc -d -p tsconfig.cjs.json && sed -i '' -E 's/\.js/.cjs/g' cjs/*.js && for f in cjs/*.js; do mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
scripts.version: npm run copy && npm run sed && git add .
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
